QuestData.Title: Dextrous Izissha
QuestData.Description: Jinyu normally avoid our order, but every few years, we find one that subscribes to the way of the Crane. One such jinyu is Dextrous Izissha.$b$bIzissha is your next challenger. He waits for you on the island's southwestern shore.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A surprisingly strong fighter, Izissha tends to keep to himself.
